mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, exchange_url, return_url, rent_url, create_time, update_time from t_third_call_back_url where id = #{id}
select id, tenant_id, exchange_url, return_url, rent_url, create_time, update_time from t_third_call_back_url limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_third_call_back_url(tenant_id, exchange_url, return_url, rent_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{exchangeUrl}, #{returnUrl}, #{rentUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_third_call_back_url
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
exchange_url = #{exchangeUrl},
return_url = #{returnUrl},
rent_url = #{rentUrl},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
